page.title: 01Clovelly Introduction
page.content: Clovelly is{situated}on the N.Devon coast between Hartland and Bideford on the A39.Clovelly's natural beauty and picturebook references drawing tourists from all over the world.An aerial view of our 12sq km would show mostly greenfields enclosed with hedges and farms,with thickly wooded valleys and a spectacular coastline rising to a 400ft. cliff. Almost hidden in a steeply wooded cleft is Clovelly village,sheltered from the S.W wind.Cars are banned from the narrow cobbled street of unique historical cottages which tumble down to the harbour.Clovelly is a living community with much rented housing. Parish{population}about 345(18+).There are only a few new buildings but more people coming in from outside Devon.
